title: 94/654/EC: Commission Decision of 29 September 1994 adopting the forecast supply balance for banana production, consumption, imports and exports for the Community for 1994
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 29 September 1994 adopting the forecast supply balance for banana production, consumption, imports and exports for the Community for 1994 (94/654/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The forecast supply balance for banana production, consumption, imports and exports for the Community for 1994 shall be as shown in the Annex hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:

For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
